EmailTemplate.description: Official Invite for NY brewery event
EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 Official NY Brewery Event Inv
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited to BlueWave's NY Launch Event Next Week!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please join us next week on Thursday, March 1st at Captain Lawrence to drink beer and talk solar! We will be there from 4:30-8:00pm, swing by whenever works for you to learn more about the launch of our NY Home Solar Loan.
If you have any questions, please reach out to George Wissing, our New York Business Development Manager.
To RSVP please reply to this email to Marketing@bluewavesolar.com
We hope to see you there!
